NK013(pa)004:0: rdor sems sgyu d+r+wa'i dbang gi brgyud 'debs ni /
NK013(pa)004:1: ston pa kun bzang rgyal tshab rigs lnga dang //
NK013(pa)004:2: rigs gsum d+r+wa ma lnga dang rgyal po dzah ku ku ra dza in+d+ra b+h+au ti dang //
NK013(pa)004:3: seng ha r+aa dza rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK013(pa)004:4: u pa r+aa dza go ma de w+ai dang //
NK013(pa)004:5: sgeg rdor sangs rgyas gsang ba bi ma la //
NK013(pa)004:6: rma lo rin mchog gtsug gyer rnam pa gnyis //
NK013(pa)004:7: zhang ston rgyal yon rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK013(pa)004:8: gnubs chen sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho dang //
NK013(pa)004:9: ye shes rgya mtsho nyang chen shes rab mchog /
NK013(pa)004:10: ye shes 'byung gnas zur chen sh+aakya 'byung //
NK013(pa)004:11: zur chung sher grags rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK013(pa)004:12: thugs sras ka chen bzhi dang sgro phug pa //
NK013(pa)004:13: rtsags tsha sh+aaka rdor sh+aakya 'byung gnas dpal //
NK013(pa)004:14: glan ston rdo rje 'od dang bsod nams rgyal //
NK013(pa)004:15: chos seng sangs rgyas dpal la gsol ba 'debs //
NK013(pa)004:16: bsod nams mgon po sgrol chen bsam 'grub mtshan //
NK013(pa)004:17: seng ge dpal bzang rigs rgyal lhun grub grags //
NK013(pa)004:18: sangs rgyas rdo rje tshe dbang mgon po dang //
NK013(pa)004:19: rdo rje tshe dpal rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK013(pa)004:20: sh+aakya dpal 'byor sid+d+hi pha la dang /
NK013(pa)004:22: / 'phags pa rin chen sh+aakya rat+na'i zhabs //
NK013(pa)004:23: zur ston rgyal sras pad+ma bdud 'dul dang //
NK013(pa)004:24: chos rgyal rdo rje rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK013(pa)004:25: rgya ston 'od gsal rang grol gter bdag gling //
NK013(pa)004:26: chos dpal rgya mtsho rin chen rnam par rgyal //
NK013(pa)004:27: bstan 'dzin rdo rje phrin las rnam rgyal zhabs //
NK013(pa)004:28: phrin las chos sgron rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK013(pa)004:29: sangs rgyas kun dga' mdo sngags bstan 'dzin dang //
NK013(pa)004:30: rigs bdag 'gyur med phan bde'i 'od zer zhabs //
NK013(pa)004:31: smin grol yongs rdzogs gdams pa'i chu bo kun /
NK013(pa)004:33: / 'dzin mdzad rtsa brgyud bla mar gsol ba 'debs //
NK013(pa)004:34: gzhi rgyud rang bzhin ma bcos gnas lugs don //
NK013(pa)004:35: lam rgyud thabs kyis mtshon byas smin cing grol /
NK013(pa)004:37: / 'bras rgyud lhun grub rig 'dzin sku lnga yi //
NK013(pa)004:38: go 'phang dka' ba med par myur 'grub shog /
NK013(pa)004:39: ces sgyu 'phrul dbang brgyud lugs gcig la gsol ba
NK013(pa)004:40: 'debs pa'i tshigs bcad 'di yang rje gter chen bla
